cast.name: 马克·霍尔珀林 Mark Halperin
唐纳德·特朗普 Donald Trump

this_title: The Circus: Inside the Greatest Political Show on Earth Season 1
trans_title: 马戏团：地球上最伟大的政治表演 第一季
introduction: Come one, come all to THE CIRCUS: INSIDE THE GREATEST POLITICAL SHOW ON EARTH. This documentary series pulls back the curtain on the 2016 presidential race, revealing the intense, inspiring and infuriating stories behind the headlines. Key characters and events from the individual campaigns are presented in real time, as they are happening. Produced in cooperation with Bloomberg Politics, THE CIRCUS is a non-partisan, never-before-attempted take on what promises to be one of the most fascinating and consequential elections in modern history.
chinese_title: 马戏团：地球上最伟大的政治表演 第一季
foreign_title: The Circus: Inside the Greatest Political Show on Earth Season 1
